string.text:
The Desert Tech MDR (Micro Dynamic Rifle) in STALKER GAMMA is a versatile, bullpup-configured rifle known for its compact design and exceptional modularity. Chambered for various calibers, it excels in both close-quarters and long-range combat. Its ambidextrous controls, lightweight frame, and high accuracy make it a reliable choice for those navigating the unpredictable dangers of the Zone. This version is chambered in 7.62x51 with a black polymer body.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Desert Tech LLC

The Desert Tech MDR (Micro Dynamic Rifle) in STALKER GAMMA is a versatile, bullpup-configured rifle known for its compact design and exceptional modularity. Chambered for various calibers, it excels in both close-quarters and long-range combat. Its ambidextrous controls, lightweight frame, and high accuracy make it a reliable choice for those navigating the unpredictable dangers of the Zone. This version is chambered in 5.56x45 with a tan polymer body.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Desert Tech LLC

The Desert Tech MDR (Micro Dynamic Rifle) in STALKER GAMMA is a versatile, bullpup-configured rifle known for its compact design and exceptional modularity. Chambered for various calibers, it excels in both close-quarters and long-range combat. Its ambidextrous controls, lightweight frame, and high accuracy make it a reliable choice for those navigating the unpredictable dangers of the Zone. This version is chambered in 5.56x45 with a tan polymer body and has been permanently upgraded with the Special Upgrade Pack.
